item.title: Import and merge multiple CSV files into one dataset
item.description: A simple task Sounds like a simple task. You have multiple CSV files in a folder. You want to import each of them into your environment but into a single data frame. Here is the challenge: most new R users have only used read.csv() to import single files. I remember, when I was an R beginner, the very first time when I wanted to import a whole bunch of CSV files, the task of running read.
